name: ext_R5_Bundle_issues
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Bundle.issues for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Bundle.issues from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Bundle|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Captures issues and warnings that relate to the construction of the Bundle and the content within it.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
